summary: Billable tickets now sync to Xero with automatic invoice generation
details:
When Sync to Xero runs, it now creates invoice line items for tickets matching billable statuses configured in the Xero module. Features include:

- Tracks billable time entries to ensure they are only billed once
- Creates one line item per ticket per labour type
- Uses configurable line item description template
- Moves billed tickets to Closed status automatically
- Prevents further time entry on billed tickets
- Displays invoice number on ticket detail page

Configure billable statuses in Admin > Modules > Xero settings.
